ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This manuscript has been released as a pre-print at [Biorxiv] ( Vandana et al., 2020). The bacterial strains used in this study, Pseudomonas aeruginosa (PAO1-pUCP18) and Staphylococcus aureus (Strain AH 133) were a gift from Dr. Kendra Rumbaugh and Dr. Derek Flemming from Texas Tech University, Lubbock, United States. We thank Sai Palande Datar, and Ambarish Khare, PhD, Department of Sanskrit, Tilak Maharashtra Vidyapeeth, Pune, for insightful discussions on the origins and practice of Ayurveda. We thank B. Balasubramanian, MBBS, MD, for assistance with Sanskrit translations.
